title: Volume 3

texts.title: The Epistle Dedicatory
texts.sourceDesc: In 1690, Norris published his <cite>Christian Blessedness, or, Discourses upon the Beatitudes of Our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ</cite>, following this up in 1691 with a set of <cite>Practical Discourses upon Several Divine Subjects</cite>. In 1693 the latter was reprinted as “Volume II”, as was another set titled “Volume III”. Thus the original <cite>Discourses on the Beatitudes</cite> retrospectively became Volume I of these <cite>Practical Discourses</cite>. A fourth volume was printed in 1698.
